title: Methodology for Developing Mobile-Based Instructional Design Models

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Course enhancing instructional design model development capabilities for current practitioners to respond to changing educational environments

learning_goals: Derive four core elements for developing an instructional design model using literature analysis techniques

Establish criteria for evaluating the reliability and validity of an instructional design model applicable to real-world job environments
